image.title: BstnChmpns — Chīsai, a small and ready to use micro-site generator.

item.title: Art
item.description:
Art

In this section I list art pieces that I enjoy. Creating pages in this art section is very simple: just add a new file and the generator will create them instantly!

  • Kaguya dancing

    23-01-2021

  • Chihiro having dinner

    12-01-2021

  • A strange looking city

    08-01-2021

  • A pensive blue man

    05-01-2021

  • A lady laying down

    02-01-2021

item.title: Blog
item.description:
Blog

I post my artist progress here!

  • Merry Christmas!

    24-12-2021

  • Happy new year!

    01-01-2021

item.title: No date
item.description:
No date

This file has no date. It means it won't be listed using a choosen date but using the last time the file was edited.

item.title: How to name files
item.description:
How to name files

This page lists the different ways of naming files.

  • No date

    26-04-2022 10:50:50

  • This is a no date test to see how things are working.

    26-04-2022 10:50:50

  • Simple Date

    23-05-2021

  • Date and name

    02-01-2021

item.title: This is a no date test to see how things are working.
item.description:
This is a no date test to see how things are working.

This file has no date. It means it won't be listed using a choosen date but using the last time the file was edited.

This is a new test.

item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.description:
Merry Christmas!

Merry Christmas to all of you! I had a lovely dinner and got super socks from my partner!

item.title: Simple Date
item.description:
Simple Date

This is a post with a single date. This date will be used both for listing and for the url.

item.title: Kaguya dancing
item.description:
Kaguya dancing

A still image from the movie The Tale of Princess Kaguya.

item.title: Date and name
item.description:
Date and name

This file has both a date and a name. It means it will use the indicated date for listings, and the rest of the name for the url.

item.title: Happy new year!
item.description:
Happy new year!

Happy new year to all of you!
